docs.snippet: The feverish activity that prevailed in the foreign exchange market for some time seemed to have subsided during the past week when price movements were confined to a narrow range and business transacted was on a moderate scale.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; Week Ended August 22, 1952

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 25 -- President Truman appointed Ellis O. Briggs, Ambassador to Czechoslovakia for the last three years, to be Ambassador to Korea.

headline.main: Envoy to Prague Named By Truman to Korea Post

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: In Uruguay, where meat is abundant and inexpensive, the hostess counts on each guest to eat at least five pounds of barbecued beef, veal or pork at a dinner. When Senora Roberto Cosio first came to this country with her husband, who is now in the...
docs.lead_paragraph: In Uruguay, where meat is abundant and inexpensive, the hostess counts on each guest to eat at least five pounds of barbecued beef, veal or pork at a dinner. When Senora Roberto Cosio first came to this country with her husband, who is now in the office of the Consulate General of Uruguay here, her biggest culinary problem was reconciling herself to our more modest servings of meat.
docs.abstract: series on favorite dishes of diplomats stationed in NYC, J Owen on Uruguayan

headline.main: News of Food; 5 Pounds of Meat for Each Dinner Guest Is Normal Allotment in Uruguayan Home

docs.snippet: Construction of a seamen's club in Casablanca, French Morocco, is a step closer to realization, thanks to a land donation by the local government, E. A. Roberts, president of the United Defense Fund, reported yesterday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Construction of a seamen's club in Casablanca, French Morocco, is a step closer to realization, thanks to a land donation by the local government, E. A. Roberts, president of the United Defense Fund, reported yesterday.
docs.abstract: Plans for bldg United Seamen's Service club, Casablanca, speeded by Govt land donation

headline.main: EVENTS OF INTEREST IN SHIPPING WORLD; Casablanca Seamen's Club Is Expedited -- South American Cruises to Be Repeated

docs.snippet: Discouraging prospects for United States exports, with curtailed demand in some markets extending into next year, were reported yesterday at a round-table meeting of the Foreign Credit Interchange Bureau in the Statler Hotel.
docs.lead_paragraph: Discouraging prospects for United States exports, with curtailed demand in some markets extending into next year, were reported yesterday at a round-table meeting of the Foreign Credit Interchange Bureau in the Statler Hotel.
docs.abstract: US traders see credit crisis worsening; estimates on backlog noted
